sentences.chinese: 图蒂从前在班上总是名列前茅，但打从上回搬家后，名次已掉到五十个学童当中的第二十名。

sentences.english: The girl quickly disappeared among the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 女孩转眼消失在人群中。

sentences.english: I could hear voices coming from somewhere among the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到灌木丛中某个地方传来说话的声音。

sentences.english: We walked among the chestnut woods on the mountain slopes.
sentences.chinese: 我们走在山坡上的栗树林中。

sentences.english: She began rummaging among the books on her desk.
sentences.chinese: 她开始在桌子上的一堆书中乱翻起来。

detailed_translations.english: in or through the middle of a group of people or things

sentences.english: He has to make a lot of after-dinner speeches .
sentences.chinese: 他经常要发表席后演说。

sentences.english: Collins gave the keynote speech (= most important speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 科林斯作了主题发言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲；讲话；[语] 语音；演说
detailed_translations.english: a talk, especially a formal one about a particular subject, given to a group of people

sentences.english: the early pioneers of the Dakota territory
sentences.chinese: 达科他地区的早期拓荒者

detailed_translations.english: someone who is important in the early development of something, and whose work or ideas are later developed by other people
to be the first person to do, invent or use something

sentences.english: Support for Mr Thompson is growing.
sentences.chinese: 汤普森先生的支持率在上升。

sentences.english: a tree which will grow well in most types of soil
sentences.chinese: 在大部分土壤里都能生长得很好的一种树

detailed_translations.english: to become bigger, taller etc over a period of time in the process of becoming an adult

sentences.english: fields of corn
sentences.chinese: 一片片麦田

sentences.english: an ear of corn
sentences.chinese: 谷穗

detailed_translations.english: plants such as wheat,  barley  , and  oats  or their seeds

sentences.english: He was sick in the evening, but the following day he was better.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上他生病了，但第二天就好一些了。

sentences.english: Write down the following information: name of product, type, date purchased and price.
sentences.chinese: 写下以下信息：产品名称、型号、购买日期和价格。

detailed_translations.english: the next afternoon, month etc

sentences.english: He laid his hand on my shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他把一只手搭在我的肩上。

sentences.english: They laid a wreath at the place where so many people died.
sentences.chinese: 他们在这么多人丧生的地方放了一个花圈。

sentences.english: Lay the material flat on the table.
sentences.chinese: 把布料平铺在桌上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 躺下；产卵；搁放；放置；铺放；涂，敷
detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something down carefully into a flat position

detailed_translations.chinese: 世俗的；外行的；没有经验的
detailed_translations.english: not trained or not knowing much about a particular profession or subject

detailed_translations.chinese: 位置；短诗；花纹方向；叙事诗；性伙伴
detailed_translations.english: a poem or song

sentences.english: Please help me lay the table.
sentences.chinese: 请帮我摆桌子。

sentences.english: What I did was lay the table.
sentences.chinese: 我所做的是摆桌子。

sentences.english: Will you be home over the summer vacation?
sentences.chinese: 暑假期间你在家吗？

sentences.english: Over a period of ten years he stole a million pounds from the company.
sentences.chinese: 他在10年间从公司偷走了100万英镑。

sentences.english: Can we talk about this over dinner?
sentences.chinese: 我们能否边吃饭边谈这个问题？

detailed_translations.english: during

sentences.english: a serving dish
sentences.chinese: 上菜用的盘子

sentences.english: an ovenproof dish
sentences.chinese: 耐热盘

sentences.english: The menu includes a wide selection of vegetarian dishes.
sentences.chinese: 菜单上有品种丰富的素食。

detailed_translations.english: a flat container with low sides, for serving food from or cooking food in

sentences.english: a victory parade
sentences.chinese: 胜利游行

sentences.english: the St Patrick’s Day parade
sentences.chinese: 圣帕特里克节庆祝游行

sentences.english: a military parade
sentences.chinese: 军事检阅

sentences.english: The marchers paraded peacefully through the capital.
sentences.chinese: 游行队伍有秩序地列队穿过首都。

detailed_translations.english: a public celebration when musical bands, brightly decorated vehicles etc move down the street
to walk or march together to celebrate or protest about something

sentences.english: We prepared ourselves for the long journey ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我们为将要开始的长途旅行做好了准备。

sentences.english: It was strange seeing ourselves on television.
sentences.chinese: 在电视上看到自己感觉很奇怪。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking to show that they and one or more other people are affected by their own action

sentences.english: The price is £25.50, including postage and packing.
sentences.chinese: 价钱是25.5英镑，含邮费和包装费。

sentences.english: You’ll need a variety of skills, including leadership and negotiating.
sentences.chinese: 你将需要各种技巧，包括领导能力和协商能力。

detailed_translations.english: used to introduce something or someone that is part of a larger group or amount you have just mentioned

sentences.english: She won a gold medal at the last Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 她在上届奥运会上赢得一枚金牌。

sentences.english: The two boys were awarded medals for their bravery.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男孩因勇敢而获得勋章。

detailed_translations.english: a flat piece of metal, usually shaped like a coin, that is given to someone who has won a competition or who has done something brave

name: attend
trans: 上（学）；出席，参加（事件或活动）

sentences.english: Only 12 people attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 只有12个人出席了会议。

sentences.english: Please let us know if you are unable to attend.
sentences.chinese: 如果不能出席，请通知我们。

sentences.english: On his deathbed the General was attended by several doctors.
sentences.chinese: 将军临终时有几名医生在照料他。

detailed_translations.english: to go to an event such as a meeting or a class

sentences.english: We went along a broad passage.
sentences.chinese: 我们走在一条宽阔的走廊上。

sentences.english: He was six feet tall, with broad shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，肩膀宽阔。

detailed_translations.english: a road, river, or part of someone’s body etc that is broad is wide

sentences.english: They once again held out on him when he asked to leave the army.
sentences.chinese: 他退伍的要求再一次遭到了拒绝。

sentences.english: She was treated by her local doctor.
sentences.chinese: 她由她的本区医生治疗。

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
sentences.chinese: 我想预约看皮尤医生。

sentences.english: a Doctor of Law
sentences.chinese: 法学博士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill

sentences.english: Newspapers vary in the degree to which they emphasize propaganda rather than information.
sentences.chinese: 报纸重宣传轻资讯的程度各不相同。

detailed_translations.english: the level or amount of something

sentences.english: She has shown no interest whatever in anything scientific.
sentences.chinese: 凡是与科学有关的她都没有表现出任何兴趣。

sentences.english: This is just a stupid argument that has nothing whatever to do with your job.
sentences.chinese: 这只是一场无聊的争论，和你的工作没有任何关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: [用于否定句中以加强语气]任何； 无论什么
detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize a negative statement

sentences.english: The Coast Guard had given up all hope of finding the two divers alive.
sentences.chinese: 海岸警卫队已放弃了两名潜水员生还的全部希望。

detailed_translations.english: If you give up something, you stop doing it or having it

sentences.english: He’s an amazing player to watch.
sentences.chinese: 看他比赛那才叫精彩呢。

sentences.english: an amazing bargain
sentences.chinese: 令人惊喜的便宜货

detailed_translations.english: very good, especially in an unexpected way

sentences.english: A meeting will be held next Tuesday at 3 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 下星期二下午3点将召开一个会议。

sentences.english: What time will she arrive?
sentences.chinese: 她什么时候到达？

sentences.english: I hope they won’t be late.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们不会迟到。

sentences.english: Maybe by then you will have changed your mind.
sentences.chinese: 也许到那时你已经改变主意了。

sentences.english: All right, I'll forgive you.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我愿意原谅你。

detailed_translations.chinese: 将，会，要〔用于构成将来时〕
detailed_translations.english: used to make future tenses
determination to do something that you have decided to do, even if this is difficult

detailed_translations.chinese: 设法用意志力驱使〔某事发生〕
detailed_translations.english: You use will to say that someone is willing to do something. You use will not or won't to indicate that someone refuses to do something.

sentences.english: Union leaders are heading for victory in their battle over workplace rights.
sentences.chinese: 工会领袖们在争取工作场所权利的斗争中正迈向胜利。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which you win a battle, game, election, or dispute

sentences.english: Try to express yourself more simply.
sentences.chinese: 尽量把你的意思表达得更简单明了。

sentences.english: To put it simply, the tax cuts mean the average person will be about 3% better off.
sentences.chinese: 简单地说，这次减税意味着普通人的收入将增加 3% 左右。

sentences.english: We had to live very simply on my father’s small salary.
sentences.chinese: 我们只能靠父亲微薄的工资过着非常简朴的生活。

detailed_translations.english: if you say or explain something simply, you say it in a way that is easy for people to understand

sentences.english: What about the Canadian policy?
sentences.chinese: 那么加拿大的政策呢？

sentences.english: The fugitive is believed to be headed for the Canadian border.
sentences.chinese: 据信，逃亡者正向加拿大边界方向逃窜。

sentences.english: Most English people bracket American and Canadian accents together.
sentences.chinese: 大多数英国人都把美国音和加拿大音相提并论。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Canada or its people
someone from Canada

sentences.english: His mother’s very sick.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲病得很重。

sentences.english: Maria can’t come in today because she’s sick.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚因为生病今天不能来了。

sentences.english: a sick child
sentences.chinese: 生病的孩子

sentences.english: a sick animal
sentences.chinese: 患病的动物

sentences.english: What will happen to the business if you fall sick (= become ill ) or die?
sentences.chinese: 假如你生病或是去世了，公司怎么办？

sentences.english: He took sick (= became ill ) and died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒后一周就去世了。

sentences.english: Pete’s at home in bed, sick as a dog (= very sick ) .
sentences.chinese: 皮特卧床在家，病得很重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 厌恶的；病态的；不舒服；渴望的；恶心的 ；生病的
detailed_translations.english: suffering from a disease or illness
people who are ill

sentences.english: A British soldier was wounded in the fighting.
sentences.chinese: 战斗中，有一名英国士兵受了伤。

sentences.english: an enemy soldier
sentences.chinese: 敌兵

detailed_translations.chinese: 军人；[昆] 兵蚁；懒汉；一片烤面包
detailed_translations.english: a member of the army of a country, especially someone who is not an officer

detailed_translations.chinese: 当兵；磨洋工；坚持干；假称害病

sentences.english: She treats me like one of the family.
sentences.chinese: 她把我当作家人看待。

sentences.english: sewage treated so that it can be used as fertilizer
sentences.chinese: 经过处理可用作肥料的污水

sentences.english: Let's go out for lunch─ my treat (= I will pay) .
sentences.chinese: 咱们到外面去吃午餐，我请客。

detailed_translations.english: to behave towards someone or something in a particular way
something special that you give someone or do for them because you know they will enjoy it

sentences.english: the Vietnam War
sentences.chinese: 越南战争

sentences.english: He served as a pilot during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在战时担任飞行员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 战争，斗争；军事，战术；冲突，对抗，竞争
detailed_translations.english: when there is fighting between two or more countries or between opposing groups within a country, involving large numbers of soldiers and weapons

sentences.english: A nurse cleaned and bandaged the wound.
sentences.chinese: 护士把伤口清洗包扎好。

sentences.english: It took several months for his wounds to heal .
sentences.chinese: 他的伤口几个月后才愈合。

sentences.english: The doctor said it was only a flesh wound (= one that does not cut the skin very deeply ) .
sentences.chinese: 医生说那只是皮肉伤。

sentences.english: a gaping wound (= one that is wide and open ) on his thigh
sentences.chinese: 他大腿上裂开的伤口

sentences.english: Gunmen killed two people and wounded six others in an attack today.
sentences.chinese: 在今天的一起袭击事件中，持枪歹徒打死两人，打伤六人。

detailed_translations.english: an injury to your body that is made by a weapon such as a knife or a bullet
to injure someone with a knife, gun etc

sentences.english: It is a glorious thing to die for the people.
sentences.chinese: 为人民而死， 虽死犹荣!

sentences.english: It is a brave person who will die for his beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 为他的信仰而死的人是勇敢的人。

sentences.english: Why do we crave love so much, even to the point that we would die for it?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我们渴望的爱这么多，甚至到了会为爱而死的地步？

sentences.english: a wounded soldier
sentences.chinese: 受伤的士兵

detailed_translations.english: injured by a weapon such as a gun or knife

sentences.english: In the first half they realise their boss is exploiting them and begin to understand the theory of surplus value.
sentences.chinese: 在前半部，工人们认识到他们的老板是在剥削他们，开始了解剩余价值理论。

sentences.english: I hope that as time goes on we will realise that it is important for us to talk openly about Aids, because it is the only way to make it appear normal, like cancer.
sentences.chinese: 我希望随着时间的推移，人们将认识到公开谈论艾滋病是一件重要的事情，因为这是唯一一条使它成为像癌症一样的正常疾病的途径。

sentences.english: It was her dying wish to have a simple burial.
sentences.chinese: 她的临终遗愿是办个简朴的葬礼。

detailed_translations.english: happening just before someone dies

sentences.english: ‘He looked angry.’ ‘ I don’t care !’
sentences.chinese: “他好像很生气。”“我不管！”

sentences.english: She felt that nobody cared.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得没有人在乎。

sentences.english: The picture had been drawn with great care.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图画得非常用心。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is important, so that you are interested in it, worried about it etc
when you are careful to avoid damage, mistakes etc

sentences.english: I always used to laugh to myself when I heard people say that we need to take care of ourselves in order to be able to take care of others.
sentences.chinese: 我听到一些人说要照顾好我们自己，这样我们才有能力去照顾好别人。 不知道为什么，当我听到这句话的时候，我经常笑我自己。

sentences.english: Because the office refrigerator is unowned by any individual, no one feels responsibility to take care of it, and certainly no one wants to take time out of his or her busy workday to do so.
sentences.chinese: 办公室里的冰箱因为不属于任何一个个人，没有人觉得自己有责任去管理或者照顾它，当然也没人在繁忙的工作时间抽出时间去做那些事情。

sentences.english: I don’t have the right tools to start fiddling around with the engine.
sentences.chinese: 我没有合适的工具来摆弄发动机。

sentences.english: a shop selling garden tools
sentences.chinese: 出售园艺工具的商店

detailed_translations.chinese: 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段
detailed_translations.english: something that you hold in your hand and use to do a particular job

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用工具；用机床装备工厂

sentences.english: The invention of the computer has revolutionized the business world.
sentences.chinese: 电脑的发明使商界发生了根本变化。

sentences.english: They subsequently admitted that the story was pure invention.
sentences.chinese: 他们后来承认他们说的纯属虚构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发明，创造；捏造， 假话
detailed_translations.english: the act of inventing something

sentences.english: If you added any text at that time, you should see it now.
sentences.chinese: 如果您在那时添加了任何文本，那么现在就会看到这些文本。

sentences.english: So when I do ask him to come with me to something at that time, he happily does.
sentences.chinese: 所以当我需要他在那时去做一些事情的时候，他都会很高兴地答应。

sentences.english: To Americans,being on one's own suggests that one is a fully independent and functioning part of the whole capable and willing to make choices.
sentences.chinese: 译文 对美国人而言，依靠自己的力量就是指这个人作为整体的一部分是完全独立并能起作用的，他有能力也愿意做出选择。

sentences.english: useful information
sentences.chinese: 有用的信息

sentences.english: A little Japanese can be really useful.
sentences.chinese: 懂一点日语非常有用。

sentences.english: Can you come and make yourself useful(= help people to do something )?
sentences.chinese: 你能不能过来帮点忙？

detailed_translations.chinese: 有用的，有益的；有帮助的
detailed_translations.english: helping you to do or get what you want

sentences.english: If you’re tired, we’ll stop and rest for a while.
sentences.chinese: 如果你累了，我们就停下来歇一会儿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使休息，使轻松；把…寄托于
detailed_translations.english: to stop working or doing an activity for a time and sit down or lie down to relax

detailed_translations.chinese: 休息，静止；休息时间；剩余部分；支架
detailed_translations.english: a period of time when you are not doing anything tiring and you can relax or sleep

sentences.english: He repossessed himself of his farm.
sentences.chinese: 他收回自己所有的农场。

sentences.english: He barred himself in.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己关在里面。

sentences.english: He stroked the name of himself with his pen.
sentences.chinese: 他用钢笔划掉了他自己的名字。

sentences.english: He was asked to manage a new department.
sentences.chinese: 他被要求去管理一个新的部门。

sentences.english: Managing a football team is harder than you think.
sentences.chinese: 管理一支足球队比你想象的要难。

sentences.english: The company had been very badly managed.
sentences.chinese: 公司管理非常糟糕。

sentences.english: I don’t know how I’ll manage it , but I’ll be there.
sentences.chinese: 我还不知道怎么去，但我会去的。

sentences.english: I don’t know how she manages with seven children.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道七个孩子她是怎么应付的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 管理；设法；成功应付，对付
detailed_translations.english: to direct or control a business or department and the people, equipment, and money involved in it

sentences.english: The whole operation is performed in less than three seconds.
sentences.chinese: 全部运算在三秒内完成。

detailed_translations.english: an action done by a computer

sentences.english: He will be continuing his education in the US.
sentences.chinese: 他将在美国继续求学。

sentences.english: 英文例句: I felt too sick to continue.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉很难受，无法继续下去了。

sentences.english: 英文例句:The road continues northwards to the border.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句: 这条路往北一直延伸到边境。

detailed_translations.english: to not stop happening, existing, or doing something

sentences.english: If I treat someone with pneumonia he will die of pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 如果我按肺炎给病人治疗，他一定会死于肺炎的。

sentences.english: Many of us live our lives running behind time, but we only reach it when we die of a heart attack or in a car accident rushing to be on time.
sentences.chinese: 大多数人为了生存拼命的赶时间，但是我们恐怕只能等死于心脏病或者在赶时间的时候葬身车祸才能赶上时间吧。

sentences.english: If I treat someone with pneumonia he will die of pneumonia only.
sentences.chinese: 如果我给肺炎病人治病，他只会死于肺炎。

sentences.english: She was domiciliated in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 她在加拿大定居。

sentences.english: Canada produces high-guality wheat.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大出产优质小麦。

sentences.english: He has lived in Canada for more than twenty years and is completely Canadianized now.
sentences.chinese: 他在加拿大已经住了二十多年了，现在完全加拿大化了。

sentences.english: The Edinburgh train will depart from platform six.
sentences.chinese: 开往爱丁堡的火车将从六号站台发车。

sentences.english: a small raised platform at one end of the room
sentences.chinese: 房间一端凸起的小讲台

sentences.english: an oil exploration platform
sentences.chinese: 石油勘探平台

detailed_translations.english: the raised place beside a railway track where you get on and off a train in a station

sentences.english: We’re having a meeting next week to discuss the matter.
sentences.chinese: 我们下周将开会讨论此事。

sentences.english: I had felt drawn to Alice ever since our first meeting.

sentences.chinese: 我来开车好吗？

detailed_translations.english: one of the round things under a car, bus, bicycle etc that turns when it moves

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动；使变换方向；给…装轮子
detailed_translations.english: to push something that has wheels somewhere

sentences.english: People of all ages should know how to practice safe sex.
sentences.chinese: 所有年龄段的人都应该知道如何去实践安全性行为。

sentences.english: People of all ages are affected, but some groups are more at risk.
sentences.chinese: 各龄年龄组的人都受影响，但有些年龄组的风险更高。

sentences.english: People of all ages ask me if there is something that can be done for them. They hark back to how things used to be.
sentences.chinese: 各个年龄段的人都问我有什么办法可以有效地帮助他们，并且总是重复说他们原来如何如何。

sentences.english: You have your whole life ahead of you!
sentences.chinese: 你有一辈子要过呢！

sentences.english: His whole attitude bugs me.
sentences.chinese: 他的整个态度都让我讨厌。

sentences.english: We ate the whole cake in about ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 大约十分钟的时间，我们就把整个蛋糕都给吃完了。

sentences.english: The whole thing (= everything about the situation ) just makes me sick.
sentences.chinese: 这一切简直让我恶心。

sentences.english: We just sat around and watched TV the whole time (= the only thing we did was watch television ).
sentences.chinese: 我们一直都只是坐着看看电视。

sentences.english: I don’t believe she’s telling us the whole story (= all the facts ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为她没有告诉我们全部实情。

sentences.english: It was months before the whole truth came out.
sentences.chinese: 几个月以后才真相大白。

detailed_translations.english: all of something
something that consists of a number of parts, but is considered as a single unit

sentences.english: The prime minister promised farmers a new deal (= a new and fairer system ) .
sentences.chinese: 首相向农民保证推行一项新政策。

detailed_translations.english: treatment of a particular type that is given or received

sentences.english: At the end of each level, there’s an exam.
sentences.chinese: 在每一级别结束时都有一次考试。

sentences.english: How did you do in your exams?
sentences.chinese: 你考试考得怎么样？

sentences.english: an eye exam
sentences.chinese: 眼睛检查

detailed_translations.english: a spoken or written test of knowledge, especially an important one

sentences.english: It looks likely that the peace talks will fail.
sentences.chinese: 看来和平谈判可能会失败。

sentences.english: Millions of people have tried to quit smoking and failed miserably (= been completely unsuccessful ).
sentences.chinese: 数百万人戒过烟，都以惨败告终。

sentences.english: his efforts to save his failing marriage
sentences.chinese: 他挽救自己濒危婚姻的努力

sentences.english: The brakes on my bike failed half way down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我骑自行车下山到中途刹车失灵了。

detailed_translations.english: to not succeed in achieving something

sentences.english: Before singing, he noodled at his guitar.
sentences.chinese: 唱歌之前他先弹了几下吉他。

sentences.english: He strummed his guitar when he talked to me.
sentences.chinese: 他和我说话时把吉他拨弄响了。

detailed_translations.english: a musical instrument usually with six strings that you play by pulling the strings with your fingers or with a  plectrum (= small piece of plastic, metal etc )

sentences.english: surgical instruments
sentences.chinese: 外科(手术)器械

detailed_translations.chinese: 仪器， 工具； 乐器
detailed_translations.english: a small tool used in work such as science or medicine

sentences.english: a musical version of the fairy tale ‘Cinderella’
sentences.chinese: 童话故事《灰姑娘》的音乐剧版

sentences.english: When he began his musical career, King played only for black audiences.
sentences.chinese: 金在音乐事业的开始阶段只为黑人观众演奏。

detailed_translations.english: relating to music or consisting of music

sentences.english: Regular exercise is a good habit.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼是个好习惯。

sentences.english: Thinking negatively can become a habit.
sentences.chinese: 消极的思维方式会成为一种习惯。

sentences.english: She has a habit of playing with her hair when she’s nervous.
sentences.chinese: 她有一个习惯，一紧张就拨弄自己的头发。

sentences.english: Some people drink alcohol as much from habit as from desire.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喝酒既是因为想喝，也是出于习惯。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do regularly or usually, often without thinking about it because you have done it so many times before

sentences.english: My mother would help me with my schoolwork.
sentences.chinese: 我的母亲会帮我做功课。

detailed_translations.chinese: 学校作业， 课堂作业； 家庭作业
detailed_translations.english: work done for or during school classes

sentences.english: Most of the relief work was done by volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 大部分救援工作都由志愿人员完成。

sentences.english: I volunteered my services as a driver.
sentences.chinese: 我主动提出来当司机。

detailed_translations.english: someone who does a job willingly without being paid
to offer to do something without expecting any reward, often something that other people do not want to do

sentences.english: The booklet provides all the necessary information about the college.
sentences.chinese: 这本小册子提供了关于那所学院的所有必需信息。

sentences.english: No further changes were considered necessary.
sentences.chinese: 没有必要作出进一步改变。

sentences.english: The doctor says it may be necessary for me to have an operation.
sentences.chinese: 医生说我可能需要做手术。

sentences.english: The closure of the factory was a necessary consequence of increased competition from abroad.
sentences.chinese: 工厂倒闭是来自国外的竞争加剧的必然结果。

detailed_translations.english: something that is necessary is what you need to have or need to do

sentences.english: He felt a deep sense of shame.
sentences.chinese: 他深深地感到羞愧。

sentences.english: Maria blushed with shame.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚羞得脸都红了。

sentences.english: (= it made her feel ashamed ) , she gained back all the weight she’d lost.
sentences.chinese: 让她感到惭愧的是，她减掉的体重全又长回来了。

sentences.english: He’s brought shame on the whole family.
sentences.chinese: 他使全家蒙羞。

sentences.english: (= it should not make you feel ashamed ) saying ‘I don’t know’.
sentences.chinese: 说一句"我不知道”也没什么可难为情的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人
detailed_translations.english: the feeling you have when you feel guilty and embarrassed because you, or someone who is close to you, have done something wrong
to make someone feel ashamed

sentences.english: You probably picked up my keys instead of yours.
sentences.chinese: 你可能没拿你的钥匙而错拿了我的。

sentences.english: Could I have tuna instead of ham?
sentences.chinese: 我可否要金枪鱼来代替火腿？

sentences.english: Instead of being annoyed, he seemed quite pleased.
sentences.chinese: 他没有生气，反而似乎很高兴。

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is not used, does not happen etc, when something else is used, happens etc

sentences.english: You probably picked up my keys instead of yours.
sentences.chinese: 你可能没拿你的钥匙而错拿了我的。

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is not used, does not happen etc, when something else is used, happens etc

sentences.english: The new arts centre will serve the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 这座新的艺术中心将为整个社区服务。

sentences.english: the Polish community in London
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦的波兰侨民团体

detailed_translations.english: the people who live in the same area, town etc

sentences.english: He did not have much knowledge of American history.
sentences.chinese: 他对美国历史所知不多。

sentences.english: Evans denied all knowledge of the robbery.
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯说他对这次抢劫一无所知。

detailed_translations.english: the information, skills, and understanding that you have gained through learning or experience

sentences.english: The party's share of the vote fell by ten percentage points.
sentences.chinese: 该党的得票率下跌了十个百分点。

sentences.english: Here are the main points of the news.
sentences.chinese: 以下是新闻摘要。

sentences.english: There are three important points we must bear in mind.
sentences.chinese: 有三个要点我们必须记住。

sentences.english: He is three points behind the leader.
sentences.chinese: 他落后领先者三分。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or unit on a scale of measurement

sentences.english: We will have to consider your offer carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们得仔细考虑你的提议。

sentences.english: The local authority considered that the school did not meet requirements.
sentences.chinese: 当地政府认为这所学校达不到要求。

sentences.english: Have you considered my feelings?
sentences.chinese: 你考虑过我的感受吗？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something carefully, especially before making a choice or decision

sentences.english: She has reason to feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她有理由感到内疚。

sentences.english: the human power of reason
sentences.chinese: 人类的理性

sentences.english: They reasoned that other businesses would soon copy the idea.
sentences.chinese: 他们推断其他企业也会很快仿效这个点子。

detailed_translations.english: why something happens, or why someone does something
to form a particular judgment about a situation after carefully considering the facts

sentences.english: I wanted to try the boat out next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 我想下个周末去试一下这艘船。

sentences.english: Some owners wish they could try out the car in a race track.
sentences.chinese: 一些车主希望他们能在一条跑道上试一下那辆车。

detailed_translations.english: If you try something out, you test it in order to find out how useful or effective it is or what it is like

sentences.english: I was angry because he hadn’t told me his plans.
sentences.chinese: 我很生气，因为他没有告诉我他的计划。

sentences.english: He was beginning to get angry .
sentences.chinese: 他开始发脾气了。

sentences.english: His comments brought an angry response from opposition politicians.
sentences.chinese: 他的话激起反对派政客愤怒的回应。

sentences.english: ‘Calm down,’ she said, looking at his angry face.
sentences.chinese: “冷静一下。”她看着他那张生气的脸说道。

sentences.english: Jesse laughed, which made me even angrier .
sentences.chinese: 杰西笑了起来，这令我更加恼火。

detailed_translations.english: feeling strong emotions which make you want to shout at someone or hurt them because they have behaved in an unfair, cruel, offensive etc way, or because you think that a situation is unfair, unacceptable etc

sentences.english: The order was no longer effective.
sentences.chinese: 这项命令已不再生效。

sentences.english: He could resist her charm no longer.
sentences.chinese: 他再也抗拒不住她的魅力。

sentences.english: She no longer feared that they should misunderstand her.
sentences.chinese: 她不再害怕他们会误解她了。

sentences.english: Dad was up the ladder, repairing the roof.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸在梯子上修补屋顶。

sentences.english: Where can I get my shoes repaired ?
sentences.chinese: 哪儿能修补鞋子？

sentences.english: The church tower is in need of repair.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的塔楼需要修缮。

detailed_translations.english: to fix something that is damaged, broken, split, or not working properly
something that you do to fix a thing that is damaged, broken, or not working

sentences.english: How do we know you’re telling us the truth?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎么知道你告诉我们的是真话？

sentences.english: The experience has taught us some basic truths.
sentences.chinese: 这次经历教会我们一些基本的道理。

sentences.english: How do we know you’re telling us the truth?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎么知道你告诉我们的是真话？

detailed_translations.english: the true facts about something, rather than what is untrue, imagined, or guessed

sentences.english: He's the best teacher, even though he has the least experience.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然经验最少，却是最出色的老师。

sentences.english: He’s my least favourite member of staff.
sentences.chinese: 他是最不讨我喜欢的员工。

detailed_translations.english: smallest in size, amount, degree, etc.
less than anything or anyone else

sentences.english: Remember, at least you have me.
sentences.chinese: 翀记住，至少你还有我。

sentences.english: He was a hard-working, honest man.
sentences.chinese: 他勤奋老实。

sentences.english: Ann had an honest face.
sentences.chinese: 安有一张诚实的面孔。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is honest always tells the truth and does not cheat or steal

sentences.english: When he received the letter he offered to apologise and to change his comments, but the club rejected this.
sentences.chinese: 奈杰尔收到信后，愿意向俱乐部道歉，并修正他的评论，但俱乐部拒绝了这个服软的表示。

sentences.english: But it has been on my mind for so long, and I apologise if it is irrelevant to some readers.
sentences.chinese: 但是它占据我的内心很久了。 如果它与一些读者没有关系，我向你们道歉。

sentences.english: Have you paid the phone bill?
sentences.chinese: 电话费你付了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a written list showing how much you have to pay for services you have received, work that has been done etc

sentences.english: How much pocket money do you get?
sentences.chinese: 你拿多少零花钱？

detailed_translations.english: a small amount of money that parents give regularly to their children, usually every week or month

sentences.english: Littman refused to discuss the case publicly.
sentences.chinese: 利特曼拒绝公开讨论此案。

sentences.english: If you would like to discuss the matter further, please call me.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想进一步讨论此事，请打电话给我。

sentences.english: This topic will be discussed in Chapter 4.
sentences.chinese: 该主题将在第四章进行详述。

detailed_translations.english: to talk about something with another person or a group in order to exchange ideas or decide something

sentences.english: great thinkers such as Kant and Schopenhauer
sentences.chinese: 康德、叔本华等伟大的思想家

detailed_translations.english: someone who thinks carefully about important subjects such as science or  philosophy  , especially someone who is famous for thinking of new ideas

sentences.english: a wise precaution
sentences.chinese: 明智的预防措施

sentences.english: I don’t think that would be a very wise move (= not be a sensible thing to do ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为那样做不是很明智。

detailed_translations.english: wise decisions and actions are sensible and based on good judgment

sentences.english: The government will review the situation later in the year.
sentences.chinese: 政府将在今年晚些时候对形势重新加以研究。

sentences.english: The decision will be reviewed by the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 这个判决将由最高法院复核。

sentences.english: The team manager’s position will be reviewed at the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 球队主教练的人选将在赛季末重新考虑。

sentences.english: If you have to cover 12 chapters in American history, begin by planning on three two-hour reviews with four chapters per session.
sentences.chinese: 如果你必须涵盖美国史的12个章节，首先计划3次2小时的复习，每次4章。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully examine or consider sth again, especially so that you can decide if it is necessary to make changes
(North Amercian English) a lesson in which you look again at sth you have studied, especially in order to prepare for an exam

sentences.english: He used his influence to get his son into medical school.
sentences.chinese: 他利用权势把儿子弄进了医学院。

sentences.english: He denies exerting any political influence over them.
sentences.chinese: 他否认曾向他们施加过政治影响。

detailed_translations.english: the power to make other people agree with your opinions or do what you want

sentences.english: Cats have a very acute sense of hearing (= very good, so that they can hear even the smallest sound ) .
sentences.chinese: 猫的听觉非常敏锐。

sentences.english: Employees need the sense of being appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 雇员需要被赏识的感觉。

sentences.english: It was dark and he had completely lost his sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 天黑了，他完全失去了方向感。

sentences.english: This is true in a general sense.
sentences.chinese: 从一般意义上来讲，这是对的。

sentences.english: Perhaps he sensed your distrust.
sentences.chinese: 也许他感觉到了你的不信任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感官；感觉；理解力；判断力；意义
detailed_translations.english: one of the five natural powers of sight, hearing, feeling, taste, and smell, that give us information about the things around us
if you sense something, you feel that it exists or is true, without being told or having proof

sentences.english: It all started to make sense.
sentences.chinese: 这一切都开始变得有意义。

name: by the way
trans: 顺便提一下（用于在交谈中插入新话题、题外话或评论）

detailed_translations.chinese: 顺便提一下（用于在交谈中插入新话题、题外话或评论）

sentences.english: There were many more deaths than was first supposed.
sentences.chinese: 死亡人数远远超过最初的预料。

sentences.english: There's no reason to suppose (= it is unlikely that ) he’s lying.
sentences.chinese: 没有理由认为他在说谎。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is probably true, based on what you know

sentences.english: This is probably their best-known song.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是他们最有名的歌曲。

sentences.english: a well-known TV presenter
sentences.chinese: 著名的电视节目主持人

detailed_translations.chinese: 众所周知的， 著名的
detailed_translations.english: known by a lot of people

sentences.english: a great adventure
sentences.chinese: 一大奇遇

sentences.english: Ahab’s adventures at sea
sentences.chinese: 亚哈的海上历险

sentences.english: an adventure story
sentences.chinese: 一个历险故事

detailed_translations.english: an exciting experience in which dangerous or unusual things happen

sentences.english: Only you could get into trouble in a town this small.
sentences.chinese: 只有你才能在这么小的城镇里遇上麻烦。

sentences.english: If you get into trouble, I’ll step out and help you out.
sentences.chinese: 如果你遇到麻烦，我一定站出来帮助你走出困境。

sentences.english: If someone swore, I would copy them and get into trouble for shouting the word out.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人发誓，我就会跟着做，然后等待着接受因喊出这些话而得到的麻烦。

sentences.english: I ran away from home when I was sixteen.
sentences.chinese: 我16岁时离家出走。

sentences.english: After his beating, Colin ran away and hasn't been heard of since.
sentences.chinese: 挨打后科林出走了，从此杳无音信。

detailed_translations.english: If you run away from a place, you leave it because you are unhappy there

sentences.english: He broke down the locked door and escaped.
sentences.chinese: 他砸开上锁的门，逃走了。

sentences.english: Vents allow any steam to escape if the system overheats.
sentences.chinese: 如果系统过热，排放口可使蒸汽逸出。

sentences.english: The girl had no chance of escape.
sentences.chinese: 那女孩没有机会逃跑。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a place when someone is trying to catch you or stop you, or when there is a dangerous situation
the act of getting away from a place, or a dangerous or bad situation

sentences.english: the entrance to a cave
sentences.chinese: 洞穴的入口

detailed_translations.chinese: 使凹陷，使塌落；在…挖洞穴
detailed_translations.english: to hollow out
a large natural hole in the side of a cliff or hill, or under the ground

sentences.english: Her mother had been dead for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲去世十年了。

sentences.english: Police are trying to contact the family of the dead man.
sentences.chinese: 警方在设法与死者的家属联系。

sentences.english: a pile of dead leaves
sentences.chinese: 一堆枯叶

sentences.english: the dead body of a young soldier
sentences.chinese: 一名年轻士兵的尸体

sentences.english: Two men were shot dead by terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子遭恐怖分子枪杀。

sentences.english: Magnus was found dead in his car.
sentences.chinese: 马格纳斯被人发现死在他自己的车里。

sentences.english: One man is still missing, presumed dead .
sentences.chinese: 仍有一人失踪，被推定已经死亡。

sentences.english: He suddenly had a heart attack and dropped dead .
sentences.chinese: 他突发心脏病猝死。

sentences.english: She was pronounced dead on arrival at the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 到达医院时她被宣告已经死亡。

sentences.english: His fellow climbers had left him for dead on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 他的登山伙伴以为他已死，便把他留在山上走了。

sentences.english: We didn’t know if she was dead or alive.
sentences.chinese: 我们不知道她是死是活。

sentences.english: When they found him he was more dead than alive .
sentences.chinese: 他们发现他的时候，他已奄奄一息。

sentences.english: Her parents were long dead .
sentences.chinese: 她父母早就去世了。

detailed_translations.english: no longer alive

sentences.english: One of the neighbors complained about the noise from the party.
sentences.chinese: 有位邻居抱怨聚会太吵。

sentences.english: FBI agents were interviewing all their friends and neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 联邦调查局人员正在向他们所有的朋友和邻居问话。

sentences.english: Our next-door neighbours (= the people who live in the house next to us ) say they’ll look after our cat for us while we’re away.
sentences.chinese: 我们隔壁的邻居说，我们不在时他们会照顾我们的猫。

detailed_translations.english: someone who lives next to you or near you

sentences.english: The funeral will be held at St. Martin’s Church.
sentences.chinese: 葬礼将在圣马丁教堂举行。

sentences.english: Hundreds of mourners attended the funeral of the two boys.
sentences.chinese: 数百名哀悼者参加了那两个男孩的葬礼。

sentences.english: the minister who conducted the funeral service
sentences.chinese: 主持葬礼的牧师

sentences.english: Nelson’s funeral procession down the Thames
sentences.chinese: 沿泰晤士河而下为纳尔逊送葬的队伍

sentences.english: Ramdas set fire to the funeral pyre .
sentences.chinese: 拉姆达斯点燃了火葬柴堆。

sentences.chinese: 如果人有许多长寿标记的话，我开始担心保险公司和别人该做些什么了。

sentences.chinese: 作为一个新年决心，我们都应该考虑照着做，我发现一个极好的网站 —— 充满生命力的纯素食者 —— 这里有食谱和许多其它有用的资料。
